Case 1:08-cv-03303-DAB Document 293 Filed 05/15/17 Page 12 of 15
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By: /s/ A. Marie Villapena
A. MARIE VILLAPENA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/29/07
By: /s/ Jeffrey Epstein
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00004659

additional_notes: The document appears to be a signed addendum to a non-prosecution agreement involving Jeffrey Epstein. The signatures of A. Marie Villapena and Jeffrey Epstein are present, dated 10/30/07 and 10/29/07 respectively. The document is stamped with a reference number DOJ-OGR-00004659 at the bottom.
